label: 大臣
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: one of two senior ministers on the Council of State. There was a senior minister of the left (sadaijin 左大臣) and a senior minister of the right (udaijin 右大臣). When there was no prime minister (daijôdaijin 太上大臣), a senior minister—generally that of the left—functioned as Council leader (ichi no kami 一上).
